original_text: But his brothers recognized Joseph, while he was still far away. Before he had arrived where they were, they decided on a way to kill him.
korean_text: 요셉이 그들에게 가까이 오기 전에 그들이 요셉을 멀리서 보고 죽이기를 꾀하여

sentences.original_text: while he was still far away
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아직 멀리 떨어져 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Before he had arrived where they were
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들이 있는 곳에 도착하기 전에

sentences.original_text: they decided on a way to kill him
